column4: Is some one here using the Rpanther aqua theme for Gtk here? I cant get it to work with X-chat. It makes the font in the line where i type these messages very hard to read since the font-color is just a tiny bit less white (a bit grey) than the background. The topic-line is the same, hard to read.    Other gtk-entrys are not hard to read, they get the font-color right.  How come xchat is this?
i probably should do the same for my question, but im not sure if the ui colors for xchat were set by ubuntu or if they came with an xchat update
i thought it was a theme-issue and not a xchat-issue,  but i can ask there aswell
